Reviews.Content: embassy suites phoenixscottsdale nice stay average embassy suites hotel sits adjacent golf course nice it’s near restaurants major malls scottsdale here’s deal positives • parking lot – free parking hotel • service checkin quick easy clerk friendly helpful bartenders cooks maids pleasant accommodating • breakfast excellent hot omelets eggs wide selection breads muffins fruit etc average embassy suites • evening reception name brand beer decent liquor wine step junk booze served embassy suites snacks somewhat limited nachos hot cheese night hot item quiche night skins ok special • golf course offered excellent discounts hotel guests course excellent shape slight negatives • clean spacious little dated couch carpeting refresh worth upgrade golf course view • charge internet access ridiculous day age • location convenient highway 51 scottsdale name imply overall value can’t beat hot breakfast reception night deals golf home base decent location decent price can’t wrong
